input_text.Prompt:
You will write a professional product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product title information.

Product title:
Arnold Homelite .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly

Product keywords:
Homelite/John Deere Trimmer Head Assembly
Fits John Deere and Homelite straight shaft string trimmers
Pre-wound trimmer spool
.095" diameter
input_text.Response A: The Arnold .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly is designed to fit John Deere and Homelite straight shaft string trimmers. It comes pre-wound with a trimmer spool.
input_text.Response B: This Arnold .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly is a high-quality replacement part for Homelite and John Deere straight shaft string trimmers. It features a pre-wound trimmer spool and is designed to fit .095" diameter trimmer blades. This assembly is an excellent choice for those who need a reliable and durable replacement part for their string trimmer. It is a genuine OEM product, ensuring that it will fit and function properly with your equipment.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: B includes some repetitive info towards the end. A is much more concise and seems to hit all the key words
